owl:Ontology.dc:title: An ontology about Jacques Delille's poetry citation
owl:Ontology.dc:description: Formal description of specific concepts in the scientific edition about citations of the poem 'L'Homme des champs' of Jacques Delille, 22 June 1738 – 1 May 1813.
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
owl:Ontology.dc:contributor: Roberta Padlina, project coordinator and software developer, University of Basel, Switzerland

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Jacques Delille verse poem
Versgedicht Jacques Delilles
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Verse poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: translated Jacques Delille verse poem
übersetzter Versgedicht Jacques Delilles
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Translated Jacques Delille verse poem.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Jacques Delille non-verse poem
Non-Versgedicht Jacques Delilles
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Expression other than a verse poem, authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: edited Jacques Delille verse poem
ediertes Versgedicht Jacques Delilles
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Verse poem authored by Jacques Delille and edited.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Jacques Delille canto
Canto Jacques Delilles
chant de Jacques Delille
canto di Jacques Delille
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Group of strophes in a verse poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing text expression
zitierende Textexpression
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Text expression citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing dictionary
zitierendes Wörterbuch
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Dictionary citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: teaching manual
Lehrbuch
manuel scolaire
manuale di testo
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Teaching manual as in the scientific edition about Jacques Delille's poetry citation.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: anthology
Anthologie
anthologie
antologia
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Anthology as in the scientific edition about Jacques Delille's poetry citation.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing anthology or teaching manual
zitierende/s Anthologie oder Lehrbuch
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Anthology or teaching manual citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing literary publication expression
zitierende literarische Publikationsexpression
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Literary publication expression citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing poem or verse play
zitierendes Gedicht oder Vers-Theaterstück
poème ou pièce de théâtre en vers citante
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Poem or verse play citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing novel
zitierender Roman
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Novel citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing essay, or panoramic literary, philosophic or Humanities expression
zitierendes Essay, oder panoramisch literarisch, philosophisch oder geisteswissenschaftliche Expression
essai citant , ou expression littéraire panoramique et pittoresque, philosophique ou scientifique humaines
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Essay, or panoramic literary, philosophic or Humanities publication expression citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing literary nonfiction expression
zitierende sachliche literarische Expression
expression littéraire non-fiction citante
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Literary nonfiction expression, e.g. historical, citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille, being a memoir, biography, history, anecdote, or correspondence.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing literary scientific expression
zitierende Literaturwissenschaftliche Expression
expression scientifique littéraire citante
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Literary scientific publication expression in esthetics, poetry and literary history, citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing scientific or vulgarized publication expression
zitierende wissenschaftliche oder vulgarisierte Publikation-Expression
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Natural scientific or vulgarized publication expression citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing catalogue
zitierende Katalog
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Catalogue citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: citing article
zitierender Artikel
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Publication article citing one or more verses of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: non-original engraving expression
nicht-originale Gravurexpression
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Image that is not an original engraving, as part of a Delille citing text expression. This image can be a painting, drawing, or engraving different from the original.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: argument
Argument
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Argument of a commentary on a citation of a verse of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: non-artist-man of letters-vulgarizer
Non-KünstlerIn-Literat-VulgarisatorIn
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Role of a person which is not artist, man of letters, or vulgarizer.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Jacques Delille verse poem scholarly edition
wissenschaftliche Edition eines Versgedichtes Jacques Delilles
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Scholarly edition of a verse poem authored by Jacques Delille.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: commentary
Kommentar
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Commentary on a citation of a verse of a poem authored by Jacques Delille.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has external resource
hat externe Ressource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relating a Delille-project resource to an external, i.e. non-Delille-project resource.
